DOC.brief_summary: A single-center prospective observational study . This study examine urine flow haemodynamic parameter abdominal surgery analyse association postoperative renal function marker postoperative clinical outcome . Primary hypothesis : • Within goal-directed haemodynamic protocol gynecologic cancer surgery phase temporary anuria . Secondary hypothesis : - Perioperative anuric phase directly associate postoperative increase NGAL ( neutrophil gelatinase-associated lipocalin ) creatinine - Perioperative renal dysfunction directly associate postoperative complication functional recovery patient - A response urine flow standardize postoperative diuretic bolus identify patient benefit pharmaceutical fluid mobilization - Within goal-directed haemodynamic protocol gynaecologic cancer surgery , method measurement stroke volume heart differ
DOC.brief_title: Intraoperative Anuric Episodes Patients Undergoing Laparotomy
DOC.criteria: Offered patient information write informed consent Female patient age great equal 18 year cytoreductive surgery primary epithelial ovarian tumour Patients relapse Ovarian Cancer Patients age less 18 year Persons without capacity consent Unability German language use Lacking willingness save hand data within study Accommodation institution due official judicial order ( Unclear ) history alcohol substance disabuse Coworker Charité Advanced disease oesophagus upper respiratory tract begin hospitalisation Operation area oesophagus nasopharynx within last two month participation study Neurological psychiatric disease begin hospitalisation CHF ( congestive heart failure ) accord ( New York Heart Association ) classification NYHA class IV begin hospitalisation American Society Anaesthesiologists ( ASA ) classification great IV Renal insufficiency ( dependency haemodialysis ) begin hospitalisation Pulmonal oedema thorax xray begin hospitalisation History intracranial hemorrhage within one year participation study Conditions follow venous thrombosis within last three year study inclusion Known allergy hypersensitivity colloidal , starch gelatine infusion solution Diabetes mellitus sign severe neuropathy
